project.title: Lean Sigma Essentials Overview
project.description:
This 30 minute eLearning course provides an overview of the fundamentals of Lean Sigma and how we are using the concepts to create a culture of continuous improvement in Global IT with IT Lean Enterprise.
This course is a prerequisite for the eLearning module: PD Board Overview Training.
Target Audience: This training is required for individuals who will be PD Board Leaders, PD Board Members and OpEx Resources supporting IT Lean Enterprise Policy Deployment Boards.
This training is also appropriate for those interested in learning more about Lean Sigma and problem solving using the DMAIC Methodology.
